properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, STOP_YN, STOP_DATE, DROP_YN, DROP_DATE, REP_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE DROP_YN LIKE ? ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC) "A") WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATE_DATE, QNA_CHECK, MEM_ID, ANSWER_CONTENT FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_CHECK LIKE ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) "A") WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REP_NO, REP_REASON, REP_CONTENT, REP_MEM_ID, REPORTED_MEM_ID, REP_DATE, REP_YN, BOARD_CONTENT, REPLY_CONTENT FROM REPORT LEFT JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN REPLY USING(REPLY_NO) WHERE REP_YN LIKE ? AND ? LIKE '%' ORDER BY REP_NO DESC) "A") WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REP_NO, REP_REASON, REP_CONTENT, REP_MEM_ID, REPORTED_MEM_ID, REP_DATE, REP_YN, BOARD_CONTENT, REPLY_CONTENT, R.BOARD_NO, R.REPLY_NO, BOARD_DELETE_STATUS, REPLY_DELETE_YN FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN REPLY P ON(R.REPLY_NO = P.REPLY_NO) WHERE REP_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REP_YN = 'Y' WHERE REP_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DELETE_STATUS = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_DELETE_YN = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET DROP_YN = 'Y', DROP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATE_DATE, QNA_CHECK, MEM_ID, ANSWER_CONTENT FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET ANSWER_CONTENT = ?, QNA_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET ANSWER_CONTENT = NULL, QNA_CHECK = 'N' WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE DROP_YN LIKE ?
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, DROP_YN, DROP_DATE, REP_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET BIRTH_DATE = ?, GRADE = ?, PHONE = ?, EMAIL = ?, ADDRESS = ?, ADDRESS_DETAIL = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = '0000' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE QNA_CHECK LIKE ?
